thread.title: From WSJ.com: WSJD: Waymo Chief Confident Tech Could Avoid Uber-like Incident

author: ComputerMagazine
title: From WSJ.com: WSJD: Waymo Chief Confident Tech Could Avoid Uber-like Incident
text: Waymo Chief Confident Tech Could Avoid Uber-like Incident From WSJ.com: WSJD: Waymo Chief Confident Tech Could Avoid Uber-like Incident Posted On : Published By : ComputerMagazine John Krafcik, the head of Google-parent Alphabet’s self-driving car unit, said he is confident its technology would be able to spot a pedestrian crossing the street in the wake of a fatal accident involving an Uber Technologies self-driving car. This syndicated article brought to you by Computer Magazine from WSJ.com: WSJD. View the rest of the article at the original publisher's site here Your email address will not be published.
